## Library.TokenLibrary type

Defines a token library that can be interacted with to mutate token values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TokenLibrary<T extends {}, R extends {} = T> = {
        [K in keyof Readonly<T>]: T[K] extends DesignToken.Any ? Token<T[K], R> : K extends "type" ? DesignToken.Type : T[K] extends {} ? TokenLibrary<T[K], R> : never;
    };
```
**References:** [DesignToken.Any](./design-token-library.designtoken.any.md)<!-- -->, [Token](./design-token-library.library.token.md)<!-- -->, [DesignToken.Type](./design-token-library.designtoken.type.md)<!-- -->, [TokenLibrary](./design-token-library.library.tokenlibrary.md)
